title: An American tail
brief_description: An animated film about a family of mice who travel from Russia to America to escape their persecution by cats. During their journey, the boy mouse Fievel falls overboard in a wild storm. In his attempts to be reunited with his family, he encounters a range of interesting characters, adventures and close encounters in dangerous and lively New York. When finally it seems he has lost his family forever, it is a friendly cat that finally reunites them. Voices include Dom DeLuise, Madeline Kahn, Nehemiah Persoff and Christopher Plummer.
